amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds appropriated by this act from being made available for the State Department to cite statistics obtained from the Gaza Health Ministry.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moskowitz amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 269 - 144 (Roll no. 313).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moskowitz amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 269 - 144 (Roll no. 313).
